attributes.action: Not to sell any part of BBC Worldwide and not to interfere with BBC's affairs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The labour government seems set on meddling with the BBC's affairs and the most recent one is a prosposed sell off of BBC Worldwide. The government has no right to stick their noses in the BBC's business. BBC worldwide is a successful institution and should be left within the hands of the BBC
